name: pyongyang
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of North Korea, situated in the western part of the country: He is still living with his family in Pyongyang. Visits to Pyongyang by Western leaders are extremely rare.
More examplesFewer examplesHe taught English to military cadets in Pyongyang from 1981 to 1985.When American troops entered Pyongyang in October 1950, they found a church organ in Kim's command bunker.He ultimately got picked up in central Pyongyang by police.
